title: XHAWK77X's Rookery
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+ My Works
**SCPs:**

* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7046 SCP-7046 Unwilling Blood] ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iEvYYy1tu7I Audio Adaptation]) A story of grief, hubris, and mass murder, about a woman who believed she alone could save the universe from the things that dwell outside.
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8410 SCP-8410 When Dreams Come True] As his life crumbles, a young boy retreats into the fantastic world of his dreams, but these dreams are realer than he knows, and carry a secret, sinister purpose.
* [[[SCP-7589|SCP-7589 A Cure For Dracula]]] The once-mighty Count Dracula, who fed on the blood of innocents for centuries, has grown weary of his bloodlust and seeks a cure for it, but is he truly ready to leave his old ways behind?

**Tale Series:**

__[[[i-didn-t-forget-hub|I Didn't Forget]]]__

This series of tales follows a young man's quest for the truth behind the events that took his brother away from him. He begins mostly ignorant of the true nature of the world he lives in, but his quest will put him in conflict with some of the greatest powers in the anomalous world, and force him to ask very difficult questions about the people closest to him.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-1-the-galaxy-plaza-disaster|Part 1: The Galaxy Plaza Disaster]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-2-spirituality-club|Part 2: Spirituality Club]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-3-richard-michaels|Part 3: Richard Michaels]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-4-guiding-star-baptist-church|Part 4: Guiding Star Baptist Church]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-5-the-star-clad-tome|Part 5: The Star-clad Tome]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-6-the-service|Part 6: The Service]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-7-the-church-of-the-blessed-sacrifice|Part 7: The Church of the Blessed Sacrifice]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-8-Theodore-North|Part 8: Theodore North]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-9-the-wanderer-s-library|Part 9: The Wanderer's Library]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-10-the-serpent-s-hand|Part 10: The Serpent's Hand]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-11-the-jailors|Part 11: The Jailors]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-12-site-17|Part 12: Site 17]]]
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-13-evan-sanders|Part 13: Evan Sanders]]]

__Dracula__
* [[[herman-fuller-presents-dracula|Herman Fuller Presents: Dracula!]]]
* [[[Cursed Ambrosia]]]
* [[[SCP-7589|SCP-7589 - A Cure For Dracula]]]
* [[[Stains of Blood and Sin]]]

**Standalone Tales:**
* [[[Hemophobia]]] - The story of an Ortothan whose efforts to give blood offerings to his gods are frustrated by his intense fear of blood.
* [[[The Feasting Day of Klavigar Nadox]]] - A slice of life tale about a Nälkän-Mekhanite interfaith couple and the unique challenges they face in building their life together.
* [[[Seasonal Emergence]]] - A slice of life tale about a bug-boy who sneaks out to go to a Halloween party.
* [[[Diary of an Adolescent Orange Blob]]] ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4tb8UQJYWpA Audio Adaptation]) - Excerpts from SCP-999's diary.

**GoI Formats:**
* [[[zeyu-eitothan|Zeyu-eitothan of the Voru]]] - An Ortothan fable about curiosity and how far we should go to judge people by their choices rather than their origins.

+ About Me

I'm a 28yo novelist from the midwestern United States. I write sci-fi and fantasy stories about strange horrors, eldrich gods, and the power of love. I often focus on LGBT themes, as well as religion, romance, and supernatural mystery.

I've been a fan of the SCP Wiki since I discovered it more than ten years ago, but it wasn't until last year that my own writing skills grew strong enough that I felt like I could contribute to this wonderful universe. I hope all of you enjoy what I create here.

+ Off-Site
Besides being an SCP author, I also write novels. Links to all of my work, including my personal blog and an e-mailing list you can subscribe to, are available on [https://www.daviscollinsauthor.com/ my author website].

My first novel, entitled The Springstorm Alpha, is available as an eBook on [https://www.amazon.com/Springstorm-Alpha-Davis-Collins-ebook/dp/B0DRF2X96Z Amazon], as an eBook or Paperback on [https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/the-springstorm-alpha-davis-collins/1144918745?ean=9798893470239 Barnes & Noble], and in serialized form on [https://www.webnovel.com/book/the-springstorm-alpha_25519290205134005 Webnovel], [http://abs.ireaderm.net/zyhw/app/app.php?ca=Share.toPcdisp&bookId=12857304&p2=120161&lang=GLOBAL&countryCode= iReader], and [https://www.dreame.com/story/1784568064-the-springstorm-alpha Dreame]. It's a paranormal romance, but it's also a mystery story about a strange town full of monsters and the brutal murder connected with it. The first few chapters are free on each of those platforms, so you might as well check it out!

I also have an [https://xhawk77x.blogspot.com/ old blog] I used to post some stories on. Among the works present there is a (basically) complete web serial called Angel of Death, which is also available on [https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/2594/angel-of-death Royal Road].
